## Success.withFailureDetail() method

Converts a [IResult&lt;T&gt;](./ts-utils.iresult.md) to a [DetailedResult&lt;T, TD&gt;](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->, adding a supplied detail if the operation failed.

**Signature:**

```typescript
withFailureDetail<TD>(__detail: TD): DetailedResult<T, TD>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

\_\_detail


</td><td>

TD


</td><td>


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;T, TD&gt;

A new [DetailedResult&lt;T, TD&gt;](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md) with either the success result or the error message from this [IResult](./ts-utils.iresult.md)<!-- -->, with the supplied detail (if this event failed) or detail `undefined` (if this result succeeded).
